sentences.en: A knid of metallic hardness came into his voice.
sentences.cn: 他的声音带有一种刺耳的生硬的腔调.

sentences.en: A sharp metallic note coming from the outside frightened me.
sentences.cn: 外面传来尖锐铿锵的声音吓了我一跳.

sentences.en: A sharp metallic rapping came on the front door.
sentences.cn: 前门上响起一阵刺耳的金属敲击声.

sentences.en: All organic and metallic residues on the wafers must be removed.
sentences.cn: 片子上所有的有机和金属残留物均必须清除.

sentences.en: Cloudy swelling is seen in febrile infectious diseases and metallic poisoning.
sentences.cn: 混浊肿胀见于热性传染病和金属中毒.

sentences.en: Even the smallest metallic object, whether a nail file or cigarette lighter, is immediately confiscated.
sentences.cn: 即便是最小的金属物品，不管是指甲锉刀还是打火机，都会马上被没收。

sentences.en: He had painted all the wood with metallic silver paint.
sentences.cn: 他给所有的木材都涂上了一层闪耀着金属光泽的银漆。

sentences.en: He spoke in a thin, metallic voice.
sentences.cn: 他说话时嗓音尖细刺耳。

sentences.en: It gave a metallic clang, like a cracked bell.
sentences.cn: 它发出了金属碰击般的哐啷声，跟破钟似的。

sentences.en: Metallic finishes are seen as upmarket.
sentences.cn: 金属般闪亮的罩面漆被认为是高档漆。

sentences.en: Place the salmon in a nonstick metallic dish.
sentences.cn: 将鲑鱼放在不粘底的金属盘内。

sentences.en: The Bi - Metallic principle has been explained on various grounds.
sentences.cn: "双金属"案的原则有各种理由的解释.

sentences.en: The body's annual intake of metallic iron is infinitesimal.
sentences.cn: 人体对金属铁的年摄入量是微不足道的.

sentences.en: The key turned in the lock with a loud metallic click.
sentences.cn: 钥匙在锁里转动发出金属撞击的咔嗒声。

sentences.en: The pair of lions which were found five years ago were metallic.
sentences.cn: 这对五年前发现的狮子是金属制的.

sentences.en: The pans made a metallic clatter as they crashed to the floor.
sentences.cn: 那些锅哐啷一声摔到地上。

sentences.en: The two opposite walls of the container are metallic plates.
sentences.cn: 容器的两个正对面的器壁都是金属板.

sentences.en: There was a metallic taste at the back of his throat.
sentences.cn: 他喉咙深处有一股金属味儿。

words.tran_cn: 非金属的；类似金属性的；准金属的
非金属；[材] 类金属；准金属
金属工人；制金属品工人

phrases.tran_cn: 金属漆，金属油漆；金属涂料

trans.tran_cn: 金属的，金属性的，金属制的，含金属的
trans.tran_en: made of metal or containing metal
